attributes.action: Stop children playing football in the street
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stop children playing football in the street as it is
a) noisy and disruptive to residents
b) causes damage to cars and gardens
c) encourages children to trespass on other peoples property
c) they invariably leave all their litter behind
e) infringes your Human Right to a quiet and peaceful life
f) encourages gang/mob culture

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
